DOC.criteria: clinical functional diagnosis Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease accord Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( GOLD , 2009 ) , forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) less 80 % predicted postbronchodilator ; clinical stability study , sex , age 40 year , body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg / mÂ² ; smoke history , symptom cough , dyspnea hypersecretion , exsmokers least three month .
